attributes.action: Make national radio stations produce more than 3.5 hours of local programming
attributes.background: Since Heart radio got rid of local programming there is a hole in the schedule please. I intend to get the matter to parliament to get this debated to get more local programming

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for Ofcom, which acts independently of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can find out more about Ofcom's localness guidelines here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/tv-radio-and-on-demand/information-for-industry/radio-broadcasters/localness

You can contact Ofcom here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/about-ofcom/contact-us
